Title: Come Back Radio Montuno
Description: Montuno has several meanings pertaining to Cuban music and its derivatives. Literally, montuno means 'comes from the mountain', and so Son montuno may refer to the older type of son played in the mountainous rural areas of Oriente. Another possibility is that the word "Montuno" comes from the word "Montura" which is the Spanish word for "Saddle", because the rhythm in Son music is like riding a horse. Or it may mean the final section of a song-based composition; in this sense it is simply part of a piece of music. Here it is usually a faster, brasher, semi-improvised instrumental section, sometimes with a repetitive vocal refrain. Finally, the term montuno is also used for a piano guajeo,  the ostinato figure accompanying the montuno section, when it describes a repeated syncopated piano vamp, often with chromatic root movement. https://www.facebook.com/comeback.montuno

Title: Cubania Radio
Description: El mejor de la musica Cubana, Africana y Sur Americana

Title: WLJR Latin Jazz Radio - online radio (not WLJR 88.5 FM Brimingham, AL)
Description: Welcome to latinjazzradio.net. WLJR is dedicated to providing the best Latin Jazz and Jazz programming on the net today. We are avid listeners and huge fans of the music and it’s artists. We are latinos paying homage to our music heritage.  Here you will hear a wide range of latino based music ranging from salsadura to brasilian to bomba plena to hard core jazz. With artists such as Eddie Palmeri, Celia Cruz, Tito Rodriguez, Bobby Sanabria and much, much, much more. Check out our track list to see what we are playing and email us to let us know how we are doing.

Title: ICRT Radio CMBF Musical Nacional 99.1 FM 590 AM
Description: El 25 de abril de 1948, a las 10: 00 a.m., salió al aire una nueva emisora cubana: la Onda Musical del Circuito CMQ, que con posterioridad se convirtió en CMBF, Radio Musical Nacional. Surgida por iniciativa del pianista e investigador Orlando Martínez –quien sería su director hasta 1969- el objetivo de CMBF era ofrecer las mejores obras clásicas del repertorio universal. Así, cada día se escuchaba en voz del locutor la propuesta: Ofreciendo música y sólo música.

Title: ICRT Radio Progreso
Description: La Habana. La Onda de la Alegría. La emisora de la familia cubana

Description: Online La Habana. Una voz de amistad que recorre el mundo. Informaciones y noticias sobre el acontecer de Cuba y del mundo en idioma español.
